BG3 Knowledge Domain Tips & Builds

Knowledge Domain is suited for caster Clerics and also has access to potent spellcasting. This domain excels in crowd-controlling enemies with Sleep and Slow, and its divine channel gives them a bonus on skill checks with certain attributes.
